about_description: A festival dedicated to literature and art for youth
guests_description: Personalities from the world of literature and art
partners_description: Our partners who make this festival possible
footer_copyright: © 2025 Apolodor Children and Youth Festival. All rights reserved.
landing_title: Children and Youth Literature Festival APOLODOR
landing_subtitle: Dedicated to children and youth in Botoșani! A celebration of books, stories, and imagination.
concert_description: A unique moment of music and poetry that will delight all ages! Get ready for a magical evening full of musical surprises and verses coming to life.
exhibitions_subtitle: Spectacular exhibitions of illustration and book-objects that will delight viewers of all ages.
readings_subtitle: Magical moments of reading and storytelling, where books come to life through the voices of beloved authors.
workshops_subtitle: Creative and storytelling workshops where children can develop their imagination and talents.
about_mission_description: APOLODOR is more than a festival - it's a celebration of literature, imagination, and childhood. For four magical days, we transform Botoșani into a realm of stories and creativity.
about_organizers_description: APOLODOR is organized by Corona Foundation and funded by the Local Council and City Hall of Botoșani, bringing together the most talented writers and artists to inspire the new generation of readers.
dan_lungu_quote: A tribute to those who made it possible for personalities like Eminescu, Enescu, Iorga, Luchian to emerge. Children's literature deserves to be treated with respect and creativity.
blog_hero_subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news, events, and important announcements about the Botoșani Literature Festival.

news_section_subtitle: Stay updated with the latest festival announcements and events
